Listen up.

2004-09-06


thu - down to morioka for new earlhammers orientation, big supper out with them
fri - lindy hop lesson in the parking lot, then watermelon party by the river
sat - one more lindy lesson, then up to ninohe to watch the gaijin monkies dance, then karaoke with the crowd not till dawn
sun - shimoda maul to watch van helsing: the coolest movie ever made, then back to ninohe for band practice
mon - school includes going to listen to a japan-air-self-defence-force band play Earth, Wind, Fire at the culture center in town

« the excitement for the evening attn: info junkies »
